sql: CREATE TABLE CustomerAuth ( Auth_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, Cust_ID NUMBER, Username VARCHAR2(100) UNIQUE, PasswordHash VARCHAR2(200), Created_At DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE, FOREIGN KEY (Cust_ID) REFERENCES Customer(Cust_ID) )
INSERT INTO Roles(Role_ID, Role_Name, Role_Description) VALUES (1, 'admin', 'System administrator')
